# ================================================================================
ELDAR1 = {
	category = Humanoid
	randomized = no

		}
		corvette = {}
		constructor = {}
		colonizer = {}
		science = {}
		destroyer = {}
		cruiser = {}
		battleship = {}
		mining_station = {}
		research_station = {}
		observation_station = {}
		transport = {}
		military_station_small = {}
		military_station_medium = {}
		military_station_large = {}
	}

	ship_class_names = {
		generic = {
			Void Stalker Dragonship Eclipse Shadow Naiad Aurora Solaris Aconite Hellebore Hemlock

			Midnight Eldanesh Spectre Wraith Phantom
		}
	}

	fleet_names = {
		random_names = {
			Alaitoc_Fleet Altansar_Fleet Biel_tan_Fleet Lyanden_Fleet Saim_Hann_Fleet Uthwe_Fleet
			Dorhai_Fleet Arach_Qin_Fleet Kinshara_Fleet Telennar_Fleet Tir_Val_Fleet Elimination_Fleet Wrath_of_Khaine Anleths_Warhost
			Maenelles_Warhost Great_Warhost The_Knights_of_Alaitoc_Starfleet The_Fall_of_Mymeara_Starfleet
			The_Harvester_of_Souls_Starfleet The_Shade_of_Twilight_Starfleet The_Tempest_of_Starlight_Starfleet The_Burning_Lance_Starfleet
			The_Cry_of_Wind_Starfleet The_Fallen_Phoenix_Starfleet The_Shadow_Hunter_Starfleet The_Reaper_of_Souls_Starfleet The_Scions_of_Midnight_Starfleet
			The_Seers_of_the_Fall_Starfleet The_Exodites_of_Vaul_Starfleet The_Knights_of_Voe_Starfleet The_Keepers_of_Vaul_Starfleet The_Corsairs_of_Regret_Starfleet

		generic = {
			names = {
				Aillbuana Aktosha Alaitoc Alayran Altansar Anaen AnIolsus Angau ArachCyn ArachQin Aringhe Ashakion Ashakion Baharra Baran Belial BelShammon BielTan Cairas_Mythar Carnac Cassion Cielar Ctho Davinuus Dekune Devaron Dezartal Doharan Dorhai Dukar Eakion Elavaes_Stronghold Emele Equinox Ethero Ethaelas Eyath Fenrih Fhirinne Fiallathandirel Finnaidanae Fivhir Galantyrs_Frontier Hadriggas_Bastion Halathel Harakh Haranshemash Idharae IlaManesh Ishiasta Ishareq Istaur Iyalith Iyanden Iybraesil Iydris Kal Kaelis Kaelor KherYs Kiliak Kinshara Kolthse Koruan Lantilfieth Lantillifieth Larusuthrah Lethidia Lileath LilaeFionnadh Lilarsus Lodors_Treasure Lugganath Mael_Dannan Malantai Margorach Marathag Marsgrech Meres Meridian Menimshemash Moroarath Morshanna Murekh Mymeara Mynathensar Nacretinei Na_daan_Kion Novar_Kion_Tar Otrilisi Quisae Rasilena Riuway SaimHann Satari Selesti Shaelia Shaeil Shem Shieluin Shiasta Sierbahn Silmoridiae Siniad Sistau StelUit Suldana Suin_Daellae Tkrahn Talithia TarEtenil Tarsus Telethai Telennar Thuyela Tiel_Carrec TirVal Tirathain Tooth_Biter Torvendis Ulam Uthuriel Valedor Varantha Yellen Yllemandion Ynneas YrArthi Yrthal Ytharis ZahrTann Zandros Zarhia Zazikel Zulasa

		default = {
			first_names_male = {
				Adrallanar Ailen Albas Alianna Alladrios Almas Alrendil Alsen Amduin Ammas Amobryn Amonel Amonlon Amonther Amorad Amothorn Amvar Anaya Aragdor Araggen Aragmes Aragran Aragrian Ardyelle Argbaer Arghyn Argsys Arhathain Ariganna Arquellia Arrolyth Arsys Arvyn Asurbryn Asurlas Asurlon Asurmen Asurmore Asurthorn Asurtyr Aurian Auric Avele Avenelle Baharbas Bahardrad Bahargard Baharmas Baharmes Baharnel Baharriel Baharroth Balebaer Baleban Balebryn Baleduin Balegan Balehyn Balekon Balelas Balelion Balemore Balethanil Balevar Barahith Barandavar Baranedor Baranlath Baranmore Barantari Bararanel Baravel Bardras Barkas Barlim Barnyl Barrad Barthanil Barthorn Barvar Bel_Annath Belehidon Belemas Beleran Beleruin Belgan Belrad Belrendil Belthorn Beltien Benesaar Benesan Beneshor Bethaneal Bilgaedrin Birliel Boreleth Caenhith Caenleath Caenrendil Caensan Caeramas Caeranaer Caerasan Caerathanil Caergen Caerlath Caermas Caertelar Caervar Caervyn Caerys Caldeer Calgard Calriel Galamon Galanlath Galanroth Galansaar Galantyr Galaranel Gasael Geruthain Gesbier Gesson Gilban Gilfabyn Gilfagroth Gilfahith Gilfamaer Gilfashin Gilmen Gilthanil Gonbyn Gonleath Gonvar Hekmonah Hihdrel Hilan Idrahyn Idrakin Idralyth Idranel Idrashor Idratari Illandra Illanor Illic Illimitar Ilthana Inessar Invaril Iriass Irildras Irillyth Irilnedor Irilnel Irolac Isebyn Isendeer Isengroth Karhedron Karus Kaygroth Kayhith Kayleth Kaylon Kaymen Kaynedor Kayrian Kelgroth Kellim Kelmon Kelrad Khiraen Korhedron Korlandril Korothil Kyanorath Kyrlrir Laebaer Laegen Laekin Laelim Laemas Laerian Laerith Laetien Laevor Lanbryn Langen Lanhyn Lankas Lannedor Lanriel Laudras Laugroth Lauseth Lausys Legirion Lenduin Lenlyth Lenran Lenrian Lenrith Lenros Lensan Lhykosidae Linril Lodor Losen Macha Machbaer Machban Machdeer Machdrad Machthorn Machtyr Maireth Malenbrin Maugan Mauleath Maulyth Mauryon Mausen Maushor Mauvan Mehlendri Menegen Menerleath Menerseith Menertien Menevan Menmore Mornedor Morromaer Morrosaar Narine Nestra Nimalla Nuadhu Olamen Olames Olaroth Olasan Oloriel Onkyn Onlim Oradras Oraleath Oratyr Osubryn Osuduin Osuroth Osuseth Osusys Phoenix Prothenulh Q_sandria Rakanis Ronahn Ruterias Rynain Saetheis Silvanol Solcar Sunspear Surainan Taebryn Taec Taenyl Taeriel Taldeer Talvan Tandavar Tanhidon Tanlas Tansen Tantien Taolis Tennedor Tenranel Teryen Torhaedril 			}
			first_names_female = {
				Adrallanar Ailen Alianna Alladrios Amonther Anaya Ardyelle Arhathain Ariganna Arquellia Asurmen Aurian Auric Avele Avenelle Baharroth Bel_Annath Bethaneal
				Bilgaedrin Birliel Caerys Catritheyn Celachia Clyona Draech Ehriahna Ehveline Elarique Eldorath Eldrad Eliac Enimiah Envyan Erathal Evanaeroth Excellion
				Faeruithir Farendis Fell Fuegan Gasael Geruthain Gesbier Gesson Hekmonah Hihdrel Hilan Idranel Illandra Illanor Illic Illimitar Ilthana Inessar Invaril Iriass
				Irillyth Irolac Iyanna Jain Jur Kael Kaeleth_Tul Kai Kalrimon Karandras Karhaedron Karhedron Karus Kayleth Kelmon Khiraen Korhedron Korlandril Korothil

			}

			}

	category = Humanoid
	randomized = no

# ================================================================================
# Necron
# ================================================================================
NECRON1 = {
	category = Machine
	randomized = no
	ship_names = {
		generic = {
			Cairn Dirge Doom_Skythe Jackal Night_Shroud Night_Skythe Scythe Shroud
			Death_Whisper Life_Leech Pariah Tormentor_of_Shadows Death_Tomb Funeral_Mask
			Lifebane Grave_Digger Bone_Taker Undertaker Flesh_Mask Metallic_Kiss Blood_Leech Soul_Leech
			Carrion_Tomb Pyramid_of_Deception Pyramid_of_Lies Pyramid_of_Hate Pyramid_of_Destruction Pyramid_of_Ruin
			Soul_Breaker Tormentor Soul_Cracker Funeral_Barge Styx The_Gallows Hangman Kiss_of_Death
		}
		corvette = { Doom_Scythe Night_Scythe Night_Shroud NECRON_SHIP_Doom_Scythe NECRON_SHIP_Night_Scythe NECRON_SHIP_Night_Shroud }
		destroyer = { Deaths_Grasp NECRON_SHIP_Dirge_Class NECRON_SHIP_Raider_Class }
		cruiser = { Scythe_Harvest Shroud NECRON_SHIP_Sekhem_Class NECRON_SHIP_Cartouche_Class NECRON_SHIP_Kopesh_Class NECRON_SHIP_Shroud_Class }

				Zoggit Zrikgutta
			}

			regnal_second_names = { Stompa Burnaboy Bonekraka Crumpa Skorcha Beast Defiler Destroyer OilGuzzler Faceless Badtoof Blackfang Bogga Grimtoof Stompa Thraka Bloodboila Ironteef Flayer Irontoof Skroll Grimskar }
		}
	}
}
# ================================================================================
# Tau
# ================================================================================
TAU1 = {
	category = Humanoid
	randomized = no
	### SHIPS
	ship_names = {
		generic = {
			Gal_leath Or_es_El_leath Il_fannor Lar_shi Il_Porrui Lar_shi_vre Kir_shasvre Kass_l Kir_la Il_Emaar Barracuda Manta Orca Razorshark Remora Tiger_Shark
			Sun_Shark Moon_Shark Bullhead_Shark Dogfish_Shark Sharp_nose_Shark Frilld_Shark
			Lantern_Shark Bramble_Shark Hook_tooth_Shark Black_Shark White_Orca Red_Orca Blue_Orca
			Pgymy_Shark Large_tooth_Shark Sei_Whale Edens_Whale Omura_Orca Hourglass_Shark
			Nicassar_Dhow Sketherqan
		}
		corvette = {}
		constructor = {}
		colonizer = {}
		science = {}
		destroyer = {}
		cruiser = {}
		battleship = {}
		mining_station = {}
		research_station = {}
		observation_station = {}
		transport = {}
		military_station_small = {
			La_rua Kau_ui Tio_ve Isla_su Malkor
		}
		military_station_medium = {}
		military_station_large = {}
	}

	fleet_names = {
		random_names = {
			Korvattra Orca_Fleet Sun_Shark_Fleet Sand_Shark_Fleet Dolphin_Fleet Stingray_Fleet Crab_Fleet

		}
		sequential_name = WH40K_TAU1_FLEETNAMES
	}
	### ARMIES
	army_names = {
		defense_army		= { sequential_name = WH40K_TAU1_ARMYNAMES_1 }
		assault_army		= { sequential_name = WH40K_TAU1_ARMYNAMES_2 }
		slave_army			= { sequential_name = WH40K_TAU1_ARMYNAMES_3 }
		clone_army			= { sequential_name = WH40K_TAU1_ARMYNAMES_4 }
		robotic_army		= { sequential_name = WH40K_TAU1_ARMYNAMES_5 }
		psionic_army		= { sequential_name = WH40K_TAU1_ARMYNAMES_6 }
		xenomorph_army		= { sequential_name = WH40K_TAU1_ARMYNAMES_7 }
		gene_warrior_army	= { sequential_name = WH40K_TAU1_ARMYNAMES_8 }
		# android_army = { sequential_name = "$ORD$ Formosians" }
	}
	### PLANETS
	planet_names = {
		generic = {
			names = {
				Tau Pech Vespid Taun Dyanoi Dalyth Falshia Viorla Sacea Autaal Ndras KeIshan Elsyeir Tashvar Vashya Tolku Firios Mugulath Vastalos UanVoss Velkhan EsTau Tros Shadraig Kamais Hosarn Korvar Vayun
				Aishi Aukiia Aoori Ciiba Ehime Uankui Viorkuoka Viormyth Gisarn Gilshan Hirtaolos Hirdras Elsynma Ibaeir Eskaya Isyth Ksiyen Kataolos Kalrios
				Sanma Vashkaya Kto Mie Mecea Mevarla Ngano Nashia Ntalos Nilshan Mtia Myannma Mtaomais Msaal Mga Taitama Tiga
				Tsarn Tmyar Tsaeir Triosaal Tyen Tishan Tyanoi Uanrios Shayth Shalek Shaya
				Ag_Ni Arkunasha Arthas_Moloch Astagor Atari_Vo Autaal Borkan Cano_var Caroch Cytheria Dyanoi Dalyth Damocles_Gulf Dolhouk_Phel Eastern_Fringe
				Elsyeir EsTau Etorras Falshia Farsight_Enclaves Firios Fio_vash Go_shol Govina Hosarn Kamais Ke_lshan Korvar Ksimyen Kuu_lan Lu_val Lubgrahl
				Mu_gulath_Bay Ndras Perdus_Rift Queh_quih Ral_eth Rann Sacea Salash_hei Salomine Sept_Symbol Shadraig Shau_Nesh Tau Tolku Tros Tashvar Taun
				Tinek_la Tsua_Malor UanVoss Uor_la Ur_Clemait Vayun Vastalos Vashya Velk_Han Vespid Vigos Viorla Vior_los Visse_el YuKanesh
			}
		}
		pc_desert = {
			names = {}
		}
		pc_arid = {
			names = {}
		}
		pc_tropical = {
			names = {}
		}
		pc_continental = {
			names = {}
		}
		pc_gaia = {
			names = {}
		}
		pc_ocean = {
			names = {}
		}
		pc_tundra = {
			names = {}
		}
		pc_arctic = {
			names = {}
		}
	}
	### CHARACTERS
	character_names = {
		default = {
			full_names = {
				Aun_Va Aun_shi O_Shaserra O_Shovah Puretide El_Myamoto Shas_Ui Ndras Krin_rax Shas_La Elsyeir Irahira Shas_El Borkan Kor_Vre Aun_Vre Tsuira Shas_Saal Ksimyen Dra_nera Por_El Bor_kan Ar_ko Shas_O Orna_xan Shas_O Dalyth Alish Kor_La Tashvar Hia_pin Aun_Ui Taun Xira_xil Anghkor_Prok Calon_oi Darktide Dasir El_Jan_kai El_Lusha El_Yis_ten El_hassai Flamechild Ghovah Gorok Griahgri Harbyx Ju Kai_to_aen Kais Kesor Kor_O_Vanan Kor_el_Vess_ral Kor_o_Gal_lo Kor_o_Y_eldi Nightwind Novastorm O_cont O_Ishu_ron O_Mau_tel O_Shalas O_Shaserra O_Shi_ur O_Shien O_Shovah O_T_yra O_Ta_Sar Or_es_Ka Ortrazk Pechallai R_Alai R_myr Rennikus Serena_Erizon Sha_Aux_Phan Shadewalker Shas_O_M_yen Shas_O_Asdia Shas_la_T_au_Kais ShiOres Sho_Aun Skychild Starstrider Valroth Vorcah Y_hol
			}
			# Always combined with a second name
			first_names = { Xira Taun Aun Bork Tsuira Saal Por Aun Shas Ar Ksi Orna Dal Aun_ti Xil Fio Sa Wua Tsu Kor Vash Gras Firen La_T Krin Irax Yanoi Giror_Ui
			}
			# Always combined with a first name
			second_names = { El_M_yen Dra Nera Kan Oxaix O_Vre Cea Sioeh Saal Alish Farsight Xo_erk Las Jilaot
			}
			regnal_first_names = {
				Xira Taun Aun Bork Tsuira Saal Por Aun Shas Ar Ksi Orna Dal Aun_ti Xil Fio Sa Wua Tsu Tsu Kor Vash Gras Firen La_T Krin Irax Yanoi Giror_Ui
			}
			regnal_first_names_male = { Aun_Cho Aun_Do Aun_Fyr Aun_Ko Aun_Pau Aun_Ro_Yr Aun_Vre Aun_Wei Aun_shi Aun_taniel Aun_va Sha_Aux_Phan ShiOres }
			regnal_first_names_female = { Aun_Cho Aun_Do Aun_Fyr Aun_Ko Aun_Pau Aun_Ro_Yr Aun_Vre Aun_Wei Aun_shi Aun_taniel Aun_va Sha_Aux_Phan ShiOres }
			regnal_second_names = {
				El_M_yen Dra Nera Kan Oxaix O_Vre Cea Sioeh Saal Alish Farsight Xo_erk Las Jilaot Tau_va Aun_cho Aun_do Aun_Fyr Aun_Pau Aun_Ro_Yr Aun_taniel Sha_Aux_Phan
			}
		}
	}
}
# ================================================================================
# Tyranid
# ================================================================================
TYRANID1 = {
	category = Hive_Mind # Arthropoid
	randomized = no
	### SHIPS
	ship_names = {
		generic = {
			Drone Ramsmiter Smeltfaster Hive_Crone Tyrannocyte Narvhal Vanguard_Drone
		}
		corvette = { Deathburner_Kraken Doomripper_Kraken Hellblaster_Kraken Stalker_Drone Hive_Crone }
		constructor = { Rebirth_Vessel Bio_Drone }
		colonizer = { Mycetic_Spore Tyrannocyte Stalker_Drone Rebirth_Vessel }
		science = { Vanguard_Drone_Ship }
		transport = { Mycetic_Spore Tyrannocyte }
		destroyer = { Deathburner_Kraken Doomripper_Kraken Hellblaster_Kraken Ramsmiter_Kraken Smeltfeaster_Kraken War_Drone }
		cruiser = { Dark_Prowler Devourer_Cruiser Razorfiend_Cruiser Void_Fiend }
		battleship = { Hive_Ship }
		titan = { System_Devourer }
		colossus = { Uterus }
		mining_station = {}
		research_station = {}
		observation_station = {}
		military_station_small = {
			Kraken Tendriled_Lurker Pyro_acid_Battery Lurking_Deep Awakened_Kraken Rending_Claw
		}
		military_station_medium = { Kraken }
		military_station_large = { Kraken }
	}

	fleet_names = {
		random_names = { Behemoth Gorgon Hydra Jormungandr Kraken Leviathan Moloch }
		sequential_name = WH40K_TYRANID1_FLEETNAMES
	}
	### ARMIES
	army_names = {
		defense_army		= { sequential_name = WH40K_TYRANID1_ARMYNAMES_1 }
		assault_army		= { sequential_name = WH40K_TYRANID1_ARMYNAMES_2 }
		slave_army			= { sequential_name = WH40K_TYRANID1_ARMYNAMES_3 }
		clone_army			= { sequential_name = WH40K_TYRANID1_ARMYNAMES_4 }
		robotic_army		= { sequential_name = WH40K_TYRANID1_ARMYNAMES_5 }
		psionic_army		= { sequential_name = WH40K_TYRANID1_ARMYNAMES_6 }
		xenomorph_army		= { sequential_name = WH40K_TYRANID1_ARMYNAMES_7 }
		gene_warrior_army	= { sequential_name = WH40K_TYRANID1_ARMYNAMES_8 }
		# android_army = { sequential_name = "$ORD$ Hormagaunts" }
	}
	### PLANETS
	planet_names = {
		generic = {
			names = {
				Beta_Fortanis Ephraeleon Porphetus Vallyx Arcteri Bekrin Gryphonne Miral Radnar Tan Ymgarl Aradium Darvon Graia Gravalax Ichar Lamarno Ghosar_Quintus Radnar Sabulorb Stalinvast Thranx Torhaven Sotha Miral Macragge
				Adrantis_Five Alpha_Shalish Amun_an_Morrus Andronicus_Prime Arcetri Arkhona Assyri Auxesia Auxilion Azoth Barbarus_Prime Barnassus Belis_Corona Belissar Belphago Berien Berien_VI Bloodfall_System Brendine_II Candau Carrion_Deep Chemos Chondax Chordelis Cocholos Colchis Cousteau_XI Cressida Cthonia Cyrene Dagonet Damnos Dolumar_IV Doton Dunen_II Eden_Prime Eireius El_Phanor Eldritch Emperors_Halo Ephraeleon Erinia Eurydice Evangel Faze_V Fell_Core Forgefane Gehoeft Gephistux Gheistos Ghorala Goleonda_IX Gorgo Grail Grangold Grendels_World Gryphonne_IV Haakonath Hammans_World Hesperax Holda Horestis Hurspraxia Hydra_Minoris Hyrus_Secundus Ichorax Isstvan_III Ixya Jagga Jangrille_Prime Jonahs_World Kamais Kaen_IV Kataris Khorion_IX Khur Klybo Krandor_III Lassiv Libethra Lilarsus Lycosidae Malodrax Malvolion Mardun_X Mataras_IV Medusa_V Megyre Miral Moirae Moloch_I Moloch_II Morlex Morrigar Morshanna Mortain Morwen_VI Naogeddon Nebrus_IX Nuceria Nurth Ohmn_Mat Okassis Olympia Origo Palomar Parosa Pelucidar Phaenon_Prime Phagir Piety Porphetus Posul Praedis_Zeta Prandium Prospero Prosperon Radnar Rapture Rebas Rhoghon Rophanon Safehold Saint_Marduks_Bane Salem Shadowbrink Shadrac Shenlong Skopios Sleef Sondheim_V Sotha Sovven "St._Josmanes_Hope" Stalinvast Stuum_Cluster Stygia Subiaco_Diablo Sybari Talon Tan Tanakreg Tanis Tanith Tarrenhorst Teruxyne Tesslan_VI Tethris Thranx Thrax Threnos Toil Toreus Tormark Truan_IX Truub_II Truub_III Tygress_IV Typhon_Primaris Tyran Valos Verdan_II Verdrun_IX Victus Vigil Xin_Cyn Yorvith Yulan Zhoros
			}

		}
		pc_desert = {
			names = {}
		}
		pc_arid = {
			names = {}
		}
		pc_tropical = {
			names = {}
		}
		pc_continental = {
			names = {}
		}
		pc_gaia = {
			names = {}
		}
		pc_ocean = {
			names = {}
		}
		pc_tundra = {
			names = {}
		}
		pc_arctic = {
			names = {}
		}
	}
	### CHARACTERS
	character_names = {
		default = {
			full_names = {
				Swarmlord Death_Leaper Doom_of_Malan_tai Old_One_Eye Parasite_of_Motrex Red_Terror
				Biothrope Broodlord Dagon_Overlord Dominatrix Hive_Tyrant Neurothropes Venomthrope Zoanthrope
			}
			# Always combined with a second name
			first_names = {
				Leaper Render Destroyer Terrifying Crazed Maddening Seductive Tentacled Mindbreaker Parasite Old Doom Grotesque Acidic
			}
			# Always combined with a first name
			second_names = {
				Hive_Guard Lictor Malanthrope Pyrovore Ravener Venomthrope Tyranid_Warrior Tyranid_Prime Tyrant_Guard Zoanthrope Neurothrope Sporocyst Genestealer Ymgarl_Genestealer Hormagaunt Spinegaunt Termagant Ripper Biovore Carnifex Exocrine Haruspex Hierodule Maleceptor Mawloc Tervigon Toxicrene Trygon Tyrannofex Dimachaeron
			}
			regnal_first_names = {
				Leaper Render Destroyer Terrifying Crazed Maddening Seductive Tentacled Mindbreaker Parasite Old Doom Grotesque Acidic
			}
			regnal_second_names = {
				Hive_Tyrant Broodlord Hive_Queen Genestealer_Patriarch Genestealer_Primus Genestealer_Magus
			}
		}
	}
